long_description: Made for warm-weather adventures, the REI Vented Explorer Hat shields your face and neck from the sun. Organic cotton is durable and breathable; polyester mesh sides add ventilation; fabric includes UPF 50+ sun protection. Partially recycled polyester inner sweatband wicks moisture away from your brow for comfort as you hike. Wide 3 in. brim provides plenty of coverage; brass snaps on each side let you snap 1 or both sides of the brim up. The REI Vented Explorer Hat has an adjustable chin strap to keep the hat on in windy conditions.
short_description: Made for warm-weather adventures, the REI Vented Explorer Hat shields your face and neck from the sun.
